## IHash interface

Interface for hashable types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IHash<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [hash()](./api.ihash.hash.md) | Returns a value's hash code. The contract of this function is: If <code>IEquiv.equiv</code> returns <code>true</code> for two values, their hash codes MUST also be equal. |
